entry.title: Binance & CZ Face New Lawsuit In The US, Ex-DOJ Prosecutor Discloses Stunning Details
entry.summary:
In the aftermath of Binance’s settlement in 2023 with US authorities and the subsequent resignation and conviction of its former CEO Changpeng Zhao (CZ), the regulatory landscape appeared to have quieted down for the exchange and its key figure.
However, recent revelations by a former Department of Justice (DOJ) official-turned-lawyer for blockchain company ConsenSys have thrust Binance and CZ into the legal spotlight.
Binance’s Alleged ‘Crypto-Wash Enterprise’
In a recent social media post, Bill Hughes revealed that the lawsuit accuses Binance and CZ of acting as a “depository” for millions of dollars in cryptocurrency siphoned from digital wallets and accounts of individuals and entities based in the US, following incidents of hacks, malware, theft, or ransomware attacks.
The…

entry.title: Shiba Inu Community Readies For Critical Upgrade By End Of 2024
entry.summary:
The Shiba Inu (SHIB) community is gearing up for a new upgrade set to launch by the end of 2024. The anticipated upgrade is expected to strengthen Shiba Inu’s decentralization by empowering the community with greater control and influence over the network.
Shiba Inu’s New Upgrade
In an exclusive interview with Arab Business, the pseudonymous Shiba Inu lead developer, Shytoshi Kusama announced a new upgrade that is set to significantly alter the Shiba Inu network. According to Kusama, by the end of 2024, the anonymous founders and core development team of the Shiba Inu meme coin will be handing everything over to the community.
The reason for this decision is to fulfill their vision of true decentralization, in which the Shiba Inu network will no longer be dependent on a group of d…

entry.title: Crypto Whale Loses $55 Million In Massive Hack: Details
entry.summary:
In a massive security breach, a crypto whale has reportedly lost $55.47 million in DAI due to a sophisticated phishing attack. The incident, detailed by blockchain analytics firm Lookonchain and cyber security firm Certik, involves the unauthorized transfer of ownership of a Maker vault containing substantial DAI holdings to a malicious entity.
Here’s How The Mega Crypto Hack Happened
The sequence of events began with an unsuspecting victim signing a transaction that seemingly appeared innocuous but was actually a setup leading to the compromise of their assets. The critical transaction, pinpointed at August 20, 2024, at 5:40:47 PM UTC, redirected the ownership of DSProxy #166,776 to a notorious phishing address “0x0000db5c8B030ae20308ac975898E09741e70000.”
Following the change in …

entry.title: Theya Introduces Direct-To-Wallet Bitcoin Purchases
entry.summary:
Multisig bitcoin vault maker Theya announced yesterday it will enable US users to purchase bitcoin through their app and have it sent directly to self-custody via hardware wallets like Ledger, Trezor, Foundation and ColdCard or through its multisig vaults.
🚀 BUY BITCOIN LAUNCH 🔥 We’re launching a much requested, game-changing feature that allows US-based users to buy Bitcoin directly into self-custodial vaults. Say hello to low fees and goodbye to complex transfers from exchanges! pic.twitter.com/aWB9vwDErZ — Theya Inc (@TheyaBitcoin) August 20, 2024
This unique feature not only includes instant funding and low fees, but it removes the hassle of moving bitcoin from an exchange into self custody. “We’re thrilled to introduce this much-requested feature,” said Sriram Bhargav Karn…

Key Points
Republican candidate for US Senate, Curtis Bashaw, started accepting Bitcoin donations for his campaign.

Curtis Bashaw, a Republican candidate for the US Senate, started accepting Bitcoin donations for his campaign. Bashaw is running for the US Senate in New Jersey to “provide freedom, security and opportunity to every New Jerseyan”, according to his X account.
The Republican candidate positions himself as a supporter of innovation and progress by integrating Bitcoin into his campaign. The move appeals to the growing number of American voters supporting blockchain technology and digital assets.

Turkey sees surge in exchange applications. SEC plans to appeal XRP ruling. Franklin Templeton launches fund on ARB. SUI leads altcoins after Grayscale fund announced. TIA rises 20%, will launch mainnet in September. STX will launch final Nakamoto Code this month. Coinbase questions CFTC prediction market rules.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 175 - THE FTX SAGA CONTINUES
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$45m, ETH ETFs: -$24m. XRP settles with SEC for $125m, rises 20%. FTX ordered to repay $12.7bn. BTC Mayer Multiple hits lowest since FTX. Saylor personally owns over $1bn BTC. Dems launch ‘Crypto for Harris’ group. Brazil approves first spot SOL ETF. Robinhood crypto revenue up 161%. Ethena launches stablecoin on SOL. Jump likely shut ‘development arm’, not trading. Nomad bridge hacker moves $35m to Tornado. Metaplanet to buy $6.8m more BTC. Binance to list TON for spot. Binance invests in SOL restaking protocol. Arbitrum Orbit chains to use USDC for gas.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 174 - SOL BOUNCES 40%
entry.summary: SOL continues to lead majors, memecoins run higher. SOL/ETH hits ATH, breaks key resistance level. BTC whales bought $23bn in last month. BTC volatility hits 20-month high. NASDAQ & BlackRock ask to list ETH options. ETH ETF inflows outpace BTC. BlackRock ETH ETF sees $900m inflows so far. New ETH L2 created ‘every 19 days’. $2bn of seized ETH transferred by Chinese police. Jump continues to exit ETH position. Move in Yen is opportunity to buy BTC: Hayes. Tether mints another $250m on SOL. DeFi revenues soar, AAVE makes $6m in one day. HyperLiquid sees record $4.3bn of trade volume. Binance saw $1.2bn inflows, biggest inflow of 2024. Nearly every Binance launchpad coin is now red. Kamala reschedules crypto leaders meetup.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 173 - ARE WE BACK?
entry.summary: BTC & ETH ETFs see huge $6bn of trading volume. ‘Real number’ of liquidations estimated at $7-9bn. 274k traders liquidated on move. 60% of top 50 coins now red for 2024. Trump says US should not sell crypto holdings. Bitcoin not as good a hedge as gold: Cramer. Ark buys $18m Coinbase stock in drop. Capula reports $460m BTC ETF holding. Moonpay has highest volume day since April. Ronin bridge saved in 4000ETH white-hat hack. Bitcoin is pretend internet money: Tezos founder.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 172 - A VERY RED DAY FOR BITCOIN
entry.summary: Bitcoin hits $50k, liquidations hit $1bn in sell-off. Macro sell-off and end of Yen carry trade blamed. Multiple altcoins hit cycle or all-time lows. Bitcoin dominance rises to cycle-high of 58%. Robinhood halts 24hr trading. Crypto funds saw $528m outflow last week. Justin Sun denies liquidation rumours. Jump Trading continues to liquidate holdings. Ethena founder confirms protocol has ‘zero issues’. Binance launches native KAS mining. Cycle hasn’t even started yet: Cobie.

entry.title: Mog: The 4Chan Meme Now Worth $800 MILLION
entry.summary: Mogging started on 4Chan back in 2016 as a slang term to dominate another person. But now, eight years later, mog has redefined itself through an Ethereum meme coin. Crypto traders Aug and Slumpt often joked that they’d launch a cryptocurrency around the mogging meme but never really pulled through. That was until Aug decided to press the button.

entry.title: Fomo Hour 171 - The Bitcoin Bounce
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +51m, ETH ETFs: +$26m. BTC bounces at $62k amid $300m liquidations. BTC volatility hits 2 month high. SOL flips ETH monthly DEX volume. SOL rumour claims insiders own 8%. Coinbase shares rise 2% after strong earnings. Marathon Digital falls 8% after revenue miss. Bybit exits France over regulation. Crypto(.)com surpasses Coinbase volume. Do Kwon will be extradited to South Korea. CVG falls 99% after exploit. JUP votes to reduce 30% team supply.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 170 - BITCOIN FALLS BELOW 65K
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +0m, ETH ETFs: -$77m. Crypto falls after Fed, Trump speech & Iran threats. Mt. Gox still has $2.1bn BTC after distributions. Lummis introduces bill to buy 1m BTC. Large BTC holders bought $5.4bn in July. Tether makes $1.3bn profit in Q2. DeFi loans hit 2022 levels. Base sees 80% of active Uniswap traders. $900m of altcoin unlocks this month. Elixir launches deUSD as rival to Ethena.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 169 - NEIRO HITS $100M!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: -$18m, ETH ETFs: +$34m. Mt. Gox move another $3bn BTC, prices stable. ETH ETFs see net inflow as Grayscale outflow slows. BTC exchange reserves hit multi-year low. XRP up 7% ahead of potential SEC settlement. UAE banks integrate crypto trading. Bybit integrates USDe with up to 20% yield. California DMV puts 42m car titles on AVAX. BTC mining to be a $20bn industry: Bernstein. Russia legalises various crypto activities. Terra blockchain halted, Astro faces $6.8m exploit. Trump raised $21m at BTC conference.
